TextGrad: AutoGrad for Text

Our TextGrad is out. We propose and design a system for automatic differentiation via text called TextGrad. TextGrad offers a PyTorch-like API designed to be fairly intuitive. This means that with few lines of code, you can automatically transform a “reason step by step” prompt you use to classify your data, in a more sophisticated one that is t...
